statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.USE_YN DESC, AA.PRODUCT_TYPE, AA.PRODUCT_NAME) AS ROW_NO , AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.PRODUCT_CODE , AA.PRODUCT_NAME , M1.NAME AS PRODUCT_TYPE , M2.NAME AS CATEGORY , AA.USE_YN , ISNULL(SP.SALE_PRICE, 0) AS SALE_PRICE , ISNULL(CP.COST_PRICE, 0) AS COST_PRICE FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PRODUCT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CATEGORY = M2.CODE AND M2.PARENT_CODE = 'CATEGORY' LEFT JOIN UCD.SALES_PRICE SP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = SP.PRODUCT_ID AND SP.BEG_DATE <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) AND SP.END_DATE >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) LEFT JOIN UCD.COST_PRICE CP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = CP.PRODUCT_ID AND CP.CLOSING_YM = CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), GETDATE(), 112) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PRODUCT_TYPE IN ('G', 'P')
AND AA.PRODUCT_TYPE = #PRODUCT_TYPE#
AND ( AA.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' OR AA.BARCODE LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%' )
ORDER BY ROW_NO

SELECT AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.PRODUCT_CODE , AA.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.BARCODE , AA.PRODUCT_TYPE , AA.CATEGORY , AA.UNIT_TYPE , AA.USE_YN , AA.REMARKS
, dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UCD.PRODUCTS ( PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, BARCODE, PRODUCT_TYPE, CATEGORY, UNIT_TYPE, USE_YN, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #PRODUCT_CODE#, #PRODUCT_NAME#, #BARCODE#, #PRODUCT_TYPE#, #CATEGORY#, #UNIT_TYPE#, #USE_YN#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS PRODUCT_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.PRODUCTS SET PRODUCT_CODE = #PRODUCT_CODE# , PRODUCT_NAME = #PRODUCT_NAME# , BARCODE = #BARCODE# , PRODUCT_TYPE = #PRODUCT_TYPE# , CATEGORY = #CATEGORY# , UNIT_TYPE = #UNIT_TYPE# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
statements.select: SELECT ISNULL(MAX(PRODUCT_CODE), #PRODUCT_CODE#+'000') AS PRODUCT_CODE FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE #PRODUCT_CODE# + '%'

SELECT TOP 1 AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.PRODUCT_CODE , AA.PRODUCT_NAME , ISNULL(SP.SALE_PRICE, 0) AS SALE_PRICE FROM UCD.PRODUCTS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.SALES_PRICE SP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = SP.PRODUCT_ID AND SP.BEG_DATE <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) AND SP.END_DATE >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) WHERE AA.BARCODE = #BARCODE# ORDER BY ISNULL(AA.UPD_TIME, AA.INS_TIME) DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BEG_DATE) AS ROW_NO , AA.REG_ID , AA.PRODUCT_ID , dbo.DateCharToChar10(AA.BEG_DATE) AS BEG_DATE , dbo.DateCharToChar10(AA.END_DATE) AS END_DATE , AA.SALE_PRICE , AA.REMARKS , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UCD.SALES_PRICE AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
AND AA.PRODUCT_ID = ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID FROM UCD.SALES_PRICE WHERE REG_ID = #REG_ID# )
ORDER BY ROW_NO

SELECT AA.REG_ID , AA.PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.BEG_DATE , AA.END_DATE , AA.SALE_PRICE , AA.REMARKS
, dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM UCD.SALES_PRICE AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.REG_ID = #REG_ID#
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.SALES_PRICE SET BEG_DATE = #BEG_DATE# , END_DATE = #END_DATE# , SALE_PRICE = #SALE_PRICE# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE REG_ID = #REG_ID#
